channel.description: Recent content in Python on WyNotes

item.title: Deps
item.description: Install deps with pip # install deps pip install -r requirements.txt # updated deps pip install --upgrade -r requirements.txt Using venv virtual environment # create virtual env python -m venv <environment-name> python -m venv venv # activate environment source <environment-name>/bin/activate source venv/bin/activate # install deps pip install -r requirements.

item.title: Python Snippets
item.description: Snippets of various python code. Time Things of time. Convert datetime to string Convert datetime to string - strftime() from datetime import datetime now = datetime.
